org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.condition

Interface JavaClassBuilderInFile

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaClass

    public interface JavaClassBuilderInFile
    Fluent builder for JavaClass Condition.
    Author:
    Lincoln Baxter, III

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder as(String variable)
      Specify the the variable in which to store matching JavaTypeReferenceModel results, and complete the builder, returning a fully configured Condition object.
      JavaClassBuilderAt at(TypeReferenceLocation... locations)
      Specify one or more TypeReferenceLocation where the specified regex is of interest.
